sentences.en: Advertisements say that the nutriment is free of any unhealthy elements, like fat or cholesterol.
sentences.cn: 广告宣传说这种营养品决不含有脂肪和胆酤醇等对人体不利的元素.

sentences.en: As them were Very abundance hungry, them ate up all the nutriment Very abundance soon.
sentences.cn: 因该饿极了, 她们很快就吃光了所有的吃的东西.

sentences.en: Besides, I've seeing IT eat a lot of junk nutriment those bad for digestion.
sentences.cn: 此外, 我还见她吃很多不利于消化的Junk食品.

sentences.en: Bread and butter is theirs daily nutriment.
sentences.cn: 面包和黄油是她们每一天的食品.

sentences.en: Eskimos use refrigerators to hold nutriment from freezing.
sentences.cn: 爱斯基摩人用冰箱防止吃的东西结冰.

sentences.en: It is ridiculous to judge a foreign culture only by its nutriment.
sentences.cn: 仅仅根据唯一全国的饮食来评价该全国的文学是荒唐可笑的.

sentences.en: Main Ingredients: colostrum, lactobacillus, soybean lecithin, albumen powder, taurine, folic acid, immune-enhancing substance, comprehensive vitamin, comprehensive nutriment, and mineral substance.
sentences.cn: 主要成份：牛初乳，乳酸菌，大豆卵磷脂，蛋白粉，牛磺酸，叶酸，免疫增强素，综合营养素，综合维生素，矿物质。

sentences.en: Objeotive: This paper reports quantitative determination of trace elements in nutriment by AES.
sentences.cn: 目的: 用原子发谢光谱分析法(AES)检测营养品中的微量元素.

sentences.en: Physical and chemical index and the compose of nutriment were analyzed.
sentences.cn: 结果表明:饼皮料的最佳配比以面粉为100%计,豆渣粉15%,木糖醇糖浆80%,亚麻油25%.

sentences.en: Soon tITedespite the first man prayed for a abode, clothes and abundance nutriment.
sentences.cn: 不久,NO· 1独立个体又祈求得到一间屋子 、 衣服和更多的吃的东西.

sentences.en: The effect of enzymes on the nutriment, stability, colour and flavor of the juices was discussed.
sentences.cn: 讨论了酶技术对果菜汁饮料稳定性 、 营养成分 、 色泽和风味的影响.

sentences.en: The matter of the body is continually changing by process of nutriment and wastage.
sentences.cn: 肉体的物质通过营养与消耗的过程不断变化着.

sentences.en: The nutriment value of dietary fiber is also influenced by enviornmental temperature that single - stomache animal grows.
sentences.cn: 日粮纤维素的营养价值也受单胃动物所处的环境温度的影响.

sentences.en: The yellow, usually spherical portion of an egg of a bird or reptile, surrounded by the albumen and serving as nutriment for the developing young.
sentences.cn: 蛋黄鸟类或爬行动物蛋内的黄色的、通常是球形的部分，回周包有蛋白，作为哺育幼鸟（仔）的营养物。

words.tran_cn: 有营养的；滋养的；有营养成份的；与营养有关的
坚果的外壳；小的东西，小容器
营养物；促进生长的东西

trans.tran_en: a substance that gives plants and animals what they need in order to live and grow
